label: FieldMapping
description: Defines a mapping between a field in a data source and a target field in an index.

fields.label: Source Field Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the field in the data source.

fields.label: Target Field Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the target field in the index. Same as the source field name by default.

fields.label: Mapping Function
fields.tooltip: A function to apply to each source field value before indexing.
